name: cnvelrels

stmt.pretty: mpbiri(c0 ∈ c1, `' c0 ∈ Rels, Rel(`' c0))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(ccnv(c0), crels))
-| wrel(ccnv(c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(ccnv(c0), crels), wrel(ccnv(c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(ccnv(c0), crels))
-| wrel(ccnv(c0))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(ccnv(c0), crels), wrel(ccnv(c0))))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(ccnv(c0), crels))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(ccnv(c0), crels), wrel(ccnv(c0))))

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(ccnv(c0), crels), wrel(ccnv(c0))), wcel(ccnv(c0), universe))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ c1, (`' c0 ∈ Rels ↔ Rel(`' c0)), `' c0 ∈ 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(ccnv(c0), crels), wrel(ccnv(c0))))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(ccnv(c0), universe))
-| wi(wcel(ccnv(c0), universe), wb(wcel(ccnv(c0), crels), wrel(ccnv(c0))))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(ccnv(c0), crels))
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(ccnv(c0), universe))
-| wi(wcel(ccnv(c0), universe), wb(wcel(ccnv(c0), crels), wrel(ccnv(c0))))

|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(ccnv(c0), crels))
-| wi(wcel(ccnv(c0), universe), wb(wcel(ccnv(c0), crels), wrel(ccnv(c0))))

comment: The converse of a set is an element of the class of relations. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 18-Aug-2019.)
